VARIABLES.NAME: type
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The alternative value type, can be DATE, TIME, DATE_TIME and DURATION

VARIABLES.NAME: date
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The date representation object, returned if the type is DATE or DATE_TIME

VARIABLES.NAME: time
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The time representation object, returned if the type is TIME or DATE_TIME

VARIABLES.NAME: duration
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The duration representation object, returned of the type is DURATION
